definition: convert (metallic mercury) into a grey powder consisting of minute globules, as by shaking with chalk or fatty oil
details:
verb
- convert (metallic mercury) into a grey powder consisting of minute globules, as by shaking with chalk or fatty oil
- make less lively, intense, or vigorous
= synonyms: blunt
- become lifeless, less lively, intense, or active
- make vague or obscure or make (an image) less visible
= synonyms: damp
- lessen the momentum or velocity of
= example: lessen the momentum or velocity of
- make vapid or deprive of spirit
= example: make vapid or deprive of spirit
- cut a girdle around so as to kill by interrupting the circulation of water and nutrients
= synonyms: girdle
